title: AntFarm
description: People need encouragement 2 submit ideas. We will host info sessions prior 2 fund launch & connect with all idea makers to offer free help.
solution: Funded proposers from prior rounds will engage the community, share best practices and offer support, guidance and coaching sessions.
experience: A funded proposer from Fund4 I can share best practices, connect funded proposers to idea makers to ensure successful growth of Catalyst.
